          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uvod v termodinamiko (idealni plin)</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction into thermodynamics (ideal gas)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in Thermodynamik (ideales Gas)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction dans la thermodynamique (gaz 
idéal)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução no thermodynamics (gás ideal)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione in termodinamica (gas ideale)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στη θερμοδυναμική (ιδανικό αέριο)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción en la termodinámica (gas ideal)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Uvod v poglavje in nekaj osnovnih pojmov termodinamike. Definicija idealnega plina in njegova simulacija.</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction into thermodynamics. Explanation of same basic terms. Definition of ideal gas and its simulation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uvod</string>
            <string language="en">introduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">idealni plin</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in Thermodynamik. Erklärung der
gleichen grundlegenden Bezeichnungen. Definition des idealen 
Gases und seiner Simulation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction dans la thermodynamique. 
Explication des mêmes limites de base. Définition du gaz
idéal et de sa simulation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução no thermodynamics. 
Explanação dos mesmos termos básicos. Definição do 
gás ideal e da sua simulação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione in termodinamica. Spiegazione 
degli stessi termini di base. Definizione di gas ideale e della 
relativa simulazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στη θερμοδυναμική. Εξήγηση των ίδιων 
βασικών όρων. Καθορισμός του ιδανικού αέριο και η 
προσομοίωσή του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción en la termodinámica. 
Explicación de los mismos términos básicos. Definición
del gas ideal y de su simulación.</string>
          </description>
